text:
e="preserve">Luiz Felipe Palmeira Lampreia (19 October 1941 – 2 February 2016) was a Brazilian diplomat and sociologist. He was born in Rio de Janeiro. Lampreia worked at as a professor at Pontifical Catholic University of Rio de Janeiro. He served as chairman of the Industry Federation of the State of Rio de Janeiro. He created a blog during his later career called "O Globo".
Lampreia died in Rio de Janeiro from a heart attack on 2 February 2016. He was aged 74.

annotations.surface_form: Pontifical Catholic University of Rio de Janeiro
Industry Federation of the State of Rio de Janeiro
